description: Creates a CloudFront function. To create a function, you provide the function code and some configuration information about the function. The response contains an Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the function. When you create a function, it's in the DEVELOPMENT stage. In this stage, you can test the function with TestFunction, and update it with UpdateFunction. When you're ready to use your function with a CloudFront distribution, use PublishFunction to copy the function from the DEVELOPMENT stage to LIVE. When it's live, you can attach the function to a distribution's cache behavior, using the function's ARN.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: A name to identify the function.

parameters.name: FunctionConfig
parameters.description: Configuration information about the function, including an optional comment and the function's runtime. A comment to describe the function. The function's runtime environment version. KeyValueStoreAssociations (dict) --- The configuration for the key value store associations. The quantity of key value store associations. Items (list) --- The items of the key value store association. (dict) --- The key value store association. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the key value store association.

nested_params.name: Comment
nested_params.description: A comment to describe the function.

nested_params.name: KeyValueStoreAssociations
nested_params.description: The configuration for the key value store associations.

nested_params.name: Quantity
nested_params.description: The quantity of key value store associations.

nested_params.name: Items
nested_params.description: The items of the key value store association.

nested_params.name: KeyValueStoreARN
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the key value store association.

parameters.name: FunctionCode
parameters.description: The function code. For more information about writing a CloudFront function, see Writing function code for CloudFront Functions in the Amazon CloudFront Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: FunctionSummary
nested_items.description: Contains configuration information and metadata about a CloudFront function.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the CloudFront function.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the CloudFront function.

nested_items.name: FunctionConfig
nested_items.description: Contains configuration information about a CloudFront function.

nested_items.name: Comment
nested_items.description: A comment to describe the function.

nested_items.name: KeyValueStoreAssociations
nested_items.description: The configuration for the key value store associations.

nested_items.name: Quantity
nested_items.description: The quantity of key value store associations.

nested_items.name: Items
nested_items.description: The items of the key value store association.

nested_items.name: KeyValueStoreARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the key value store association.

nested_items.name: FunctionMetadata
nested_items.description: Contains metadata about a CloudFront function.

nested_items.name: FunctionARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the function. The ARN uniquely identifies the function.

nested_items.name: Stage
nested_items.description: The stage that the function is in, either DEVELOPMENT or LIVE.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the function was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the function was most recently updated.

nested_items.name: Location
nested_items.description: The URL of the CloudFront function. Use the URL to manage the function with the CloudFront API.

nested_items.name: ETag
nested_items.description: The version identifier for the current version of the CloudFront function.
